ygData.subject: Re: CE: Orc Captains
ygData.msgSnippet: One of my first answers is they should be able to Summon formation . This would work like Summon Defense , but a much stronger effect. Really weak opponent

One of my first answers is they should be able to "Summon formation". 
 This would work like "Summon Defense", but a much stronger effect.  
Really weak opponent orcs might be "enticed" by this "Summon 
formation" attack.

2nd answer, if an orc is within a certain distance of an orc captain 
on the same team, the orc should get some benefits.  Like the orc 
becomes more accurate with its attacks or something along those lines 
so that having both an orc and orc captain makes sense.

3rd - orc captain might be able to throw a net over opponents, 
rendering them unable to move until the net is destroyed.
